text: The Woman in Red is a 1984 American romantic comedy movie directed by Gene Wilder (who also stars) and is a remake of the 1976 French movie Pardon Mon Affaire. It also stars Kelly LeBrock, Charles Grodin, Gilda Radner, Joseph Bologna, Judith Ivey and was distributed by Orion Pictures. It won an Academy Award in 1985. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Gene Wilder Category:Movies set in San Francisco
title: The Woman in Red (1984 movie)
